clues.text: Here's a twist: he created Clara Copperfield

In 1728 Alexander Pope satirized his enemies not in "The Dopiad" or "The Fooliad", but in this mock-heroic poem

A 3-term U.S. Representative, she made a failed run at national office in 1984
This world leader was assassinated on Halloween by 2 of her security guards
His fortune would balloon after he formed Virgin Atlantic Airlines in '84

History:
Herman's Hermits hit No. 1 in 1965 singing "I'm" this man, "I Am"

Shop:

Math:
This group hit No. 1 with "You're Once, Twice, Three Times A Lady"

Gym:
Olivia Newton-John topped the charts for 10 weeks with this 1981 1-word-title tune

Bad English:
That group made its Top 40 debut in '89 with "When I See You" do this

"But if I lose you, what is left for me to hope for?  What reason for continuing on life's" this, a sacred journey

rounds.text: Also found before "pack" & "team", it's defined as increase in volume resulting from increase in temperature
